text: Fomɨra Israelɨn gumazamiziba, Moses Osirizir Araziba ini, ezɨ arazir kam kamaghɨn mɨgei, Livain gumaziba Godɨn ofa gamir ingangarim damu. Eghtɨma Livain gumazibar ofa gamir ingangarim, a gumazamizibar amutɨ me bar deraghvɨra ikɨtɨ, manmagh sua God ghaze, ofa gamir gumazir igharazim gɨn otivam? A Melkisedeghɨn mɨn ikiam. Egh Aronɨn mɨn puvatɨgham.
